results.title: Shenzhen Huazhixin Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. - Protable Monitor, Type-C ...
results.content: Shenzhen Huazhixin Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. is a professional portable monitor manufacturer in Shenzhen city of China . It is an innovative technology company integrating independent research, development, production and sales.
results.raw_content:
Portable Monitor Workstation-Laptop Screen Extender
Providing laptop users with perfect multi-screen simultaneous display and multi-screen independent display solutions to efficient multi-tasking.
13.3 inch of two FHD IPS screens,just need one cable to connect with your laptop,compatible with both Windows and MacOs system Laptops.Maximum resolution 1920x1080P, refresh rate 60Hz, 72%NTSC and a wide viewing angle of 178°,unique design of light weight frame,easy and convenient to carry it anywhere.
HOT MODEL- Z1 PORTABLE MONITOR
This model of 15.6inch portable monitor is using an advanced IPS screen with 178° wide viewing angle, delivers 1920*1080 high resolution pixels with HDR technology function.
It is easy to connect with your laptop /desktop computer /mobile phone /game console and 99% HDMI output devices ect, supporting duplicated display mode / portrait display mode and extended display mode with one cable connection.
It is ideal for enlarging or extending your electronic devices anytime anywhere.

results.raw_content:
Shenzhen Hongxuan Optoelectronic Technology Co.,Ltd
Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing
shenzhen, GuangDong
8 followers
About us
ShenZhen HongXuan Optoelectronics Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002, mainly manufactures CREE led lens,Philips Lumileds led lens,Osram led lens,Seoul led lens,Nichia led lens,Bridgelux led lens,Citizen led lens,aspheric lens,glass lens,Solar Fresnel lens,asymmetric street lights lens,IP Rated optics lens. It is one of the largest manufacturer of led lens,with the forward-looking perspective and the spirit of Focus, concentrate, specialize to open up an entirely new optical age.
We adhering to the "Swan through the infinite, Products used in the world" as business philosophy, take â€œquality and development" as operating principles. Provide the customers the most competitive solution from JDSM JDVM, develop to global logistics.
We have been dedicated to research and innovation always, taken core technology as center, ensured that our products can match with many domestic and foreign semiconductor perfectly, like CREE, OSRAM. EDISON,
LUXEON, BRIDGELUX, SEOUL, SAMSUNG, LUMINUS and so on.
As the semiconductor industry boom worldwide, our products have throughout Europe, the Americas, and the Middle East gradually. We take solve the thinking problems of customers as our mission, always have a good reputation and establish a good business relations with the clients

Company profile
Shenzhen Bond Optoelectronic Co., Ltd is a professional manufacturer specializing in various LED modules,LED strip,LED power supply and other related products,"With us your money is safe,you business is safe"is our company's business concept and service principle.Through our working experience and manufacturing technical capabilities,our company has already obtained ISO Quality Certification and CE Certification.Our R&D Department is constantly researching and developing new and innovative lighting series products for the changing market needs.We handle the entire process from material purchasing toproduct shipping,with quality controlled by our company.Our quality commitment is "There is no best,only better"Customer satisfaction is our goal.
